channel.title: [Urgent] (NDE) NPC Definitions? [Dementhium][639]
channel.description:
Hello, I have ... Not necissarily an issue but a question i would like to address.. I've Modified some NPC definitions and saved them but when i restarted my server, nothing changed in them. Am i suppose to compile with NetBeans? If so... Is there a tutorial on how/what i should implement in the sources and etc... If not what do i have to do? Which file would i have to move, what would i have to compile, or basically anything else i would have to do, after modifying, saving and closing the program, i am very lost and i've been trying to figure this out for about 3 days now... So i have resorted to the Server Help section... I guess i cannot do everything on my own... If somebody can help me or walk me through it etc... That would be wonderful. I really, really, need this.
Thank you for your attention, have a great day. - M.I.A.
